column4: hey,i jus installed compiz-fusion on my ubuntu 7.10.thing is my cube,or at least what its supposed to be,is not a cube,its like a pagehow do i get a cube?
Positronic:how do i get my ubuntu to play video and mp3?
ubotu:so wat do u suugest i do?
amenado:so wat player can i use?
amenado:what do you use,i just wanna be able to play video and mp3,i don't care what player  it is lond as its stable
ubuntu-restricted-extras for a start; automatix is a huge mistake
vlc is fine, but you still need the codecs; perhaps also add win32codecs from medibuntu
sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras  then go to www.medibuntu.org for instructions on how to install libdvdcss2 and win32codecs
then enable the repos in synaptic hit refresh and then try again
you need to tab the agreement
tab to the agree/ok and then hit enter
hey is this the right way to install emerald:sudo apt-get install emerald? en how do i get it up en running?
sudo apt-get install packagename in this case build-essential
